title: Christmas in August! All Lofts $1995! Furnished Unit+Util. Included!
posting_body: ['If you are relocating to beautiful Downtown Bellevue, Pacific Inn Apartments has the BEST options available in this area period.', 'We are an excellent option for those who need something temporarily or permanently.', 'We are the only all inclusive Month to Month option in downtown Bellevue.', 'Period.', 'All inclusive means all utilities, cable, internet, water are included in your monthly rent.', 'We even throw in free parking in our secured garage with weekly housekeeping.', 'The Pacific Inn Apartments is a newly furnished apartment community ideally located in downtown Bellevue near Amazon, Microsoft, Puget Sound Energy, Concur, PAACAR, Overlake Medical Center, numerous gaming companies, restaurants, nightlife and city transit.', ' Rent your Best value Loft today!', 'Your Rent Package INCLUDES:', 'All Utilities', 'Expanded HD Cable TV with High Speed Internet', 'Secure Garage Parking', 'Weekly cleaning with fresh linens and towels', 'Free Local calling', '24 hour Exercise Room', 'Business Center', 'Laundry Room', 'Cats Allowed.', 'No Dogs.', 'Select Loft: $1,995 - $2,145 - select unit based on availability.', 'Take advantage of this amazing price for move-in NOW!', 'These units are affordable, clean and in a perfect location for work, shopping, restaurants and mass transit.', ' amazing walking Score of 90!', 'Ideal for contractors, relocation, and students.', ' Everything included in ONE Single price.', 'Please visit our Facebook and Twitter pages for more information.', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'for more information and to schedule a socially distanced tour with us.', 'Pacific Inn Apartments', '225 112th Ave NE', 'Bellevue WA 98004', '<URL>', 'show contact info', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
